name: To Flee Scotland
description: Macbeth and Lady Macbeth are now run by flatterers and cowards, and anyone with a little courage and zeal has two options: to flee Scotland or to accept death. So a terrible atmosphere prevails in Scotland and even big men often take refuge in the forest for fear of being killed. Mad Macbeth, who aspires to the insane throne, washes his dirty hands to get rid of the bloodshed of Duncan and others; But each time he is more and more tormented by his conscience, and he walks in the hallway of the palace, revealing the secret, and Nadima and the others tremble at how Lady Macbeth and Macbeth have stained their hands with the blood of others.
